text:
Hi, 

Users claiming that the following message appears while trying to copy JP@GC's Composite Graph listener:
    Resource string not found: [clipboard_node_read_error] 

I did grep the sources and found only mentions of this string in Copy.java

Original user's post is here:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/jmeter-plugins/tIDwQ0LEV74
creator: apc4@ya.ru

text: Also it is quite sad that the Exception causing the problem is not logged with full stacktrace. It is not logged at all, so difficult to diagnose root problem
creator: apc4@ya.ru

text:
